sect1.title: Synopsis
sect1.para: On this page, the integrated (sub-) workflow can be viewed. Displayed components can be disabled to remove them from the intergrated wokflow or single connections can be deleted.

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Disable components to remove them from your integrated workflow. Use the context menu or select the component in the editor for dis-/enabling. Open connections will be added automatically to the table on the Mapping Page and can serve as inputs or outputs for the integrated workflow component. Use the connection manager to delete single connections in case you do not wish to disable the whole component from your workflow.
Note: Components can not be added to the previous selected (sub-) workflow. Only enabling/disabling of components is possible.
